verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, prophesy against the prophets of Israel that prophesy, and say thou unto them that prophesy out of their own hearts, Hear ye the word of the LORD;
verses.web: “Son of man, prophesy against the prophets of Israel who prophesy, and say to those who prophesy out of their own heart, ‘Hear LORD’s word:
verses.ct: "Son of man, prophesy against the prophets of Israel who are out there prophesying. Tell those who make up prophecies from their own imagination, 'Listen to the word of the LORD!

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Woe unto the foolish prophets, that follow their own spirit, and have seen nothing!
verses.web: The Lord LORD says, “Woe to the foolish prophets, who follow their own spirit, and have seen nothing!
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: How terrible it will be for the foolish prophets who follow their own spirit and have seen nothing at all!

verses.kjv: O Israel, thy prophets are like the foxes in the deserts.
verses.web: Israel, your prophets have been like foxes in the waste places.
verses.ct: Israel, your prophets are like foxes scavenging through ruins.

verses.kjv: Ye have not gone up into the gaps, neither made up the hedge for the house of Israel to stand in the battle in the day of the LORD.
verses.web: You have not gone up into the gaps or built up the wall for the house of Israel, to stand in the battle in LORD’s day.
verses.ct: You haven't stepped into the gaps in the wall or repaired the defenses for the people of Israel so they could stand firm in battle on the day of the LORD.

verses.kjv: They have seen vanity and lying divination, saying, The LORD saith: and the LORD hath not sent them: and they have made others to hope that they would confirm the word.
verses.web: They have seen falsehood and lying divination, who say, ‘LORD says;’ but LORD has not sent them. They have made men to hope that the word would be confirmed.
verses.ct: These prophets see false visions and speak lying predictions. They say, 'The LORD declares!' — but the LORD never sent them. Yet they've led people to expect that their words would come true.

verses.kjv: Have ye not seen a vain vision, and have ye not spoken a lying divination, whereas ye say, The LORD saith it; albeit I have not spoken?
verses.web: Haven’t you seen a false vision, and haven’t you spoken a lying divination, in that you say, ‘LORD says;’ but I have not spoken?”
verses.ct: Haven't you seen false visions? Haven't you spoken lying predictions when you say, 'The LORD declares' — even though I never said a word?"

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Because ye have spoken vanity, and seen lies, therefore, behold, I am against you, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: “ ‘Therefore the Lord LORD says: “Because you have spoken falsehood and seen lies, therefore, behold, I am against you,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: "So this is what the Lord GOD says: Because you have spoken what is false and seen what is a lie, I am against you," declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: And mine hand shall be upon the prophets that see vanity, and that divine lies: they shall not be in the assembly of my people, neither shall they be written in the writing of the house of Israel, neither shall they enter into the land of Israel; and ye shall know that I am the Lord GOD.
verses.web: “My hand will be against the prophets who see false visions and who utter lying divinations. They will not be in the council of my people, neither will they be written in the writing of the house of Israel, neither will they enter into the land of Israel. Then you will know that I am the Lord LORD.”
verses.ct: "My hand will come down on the prophets who see false visions and speak lying predictions. They will have no place in the council of my people. Their names will not be recorded in the register of the house of Israel, and they will never set foot in the land of Israel again. Then you will know that I am the Lord GOD."

verses.kjv: Because, even because they have seduced my people, saying, Peace; and there was no peace; and one built up a wall, and, lo, others daubed it with untempered morter:
verses.web: “ ‘Because, even because they have seduced my people, saying, “Peace;” and there is no peace. When one builds up a wall, behold, they plaster it with whitewash.
verses.ct: "This is happening because they have led my people astray, saying, 'Peace!' when there is no peace. When someone builds a flimsy wall, they come along and coat it with whitewash to make it look solid.

verses.kjv: Say unto them which daub it with untempered morter, that it shall fall: there shall be an overflowing shower; and ye, O great hailstones, shall fall; and a stormy wind shall rend it.
verses.web: Tell those who plaster it with whitewash that it will fall. There will be an overflowing shower; and you, great hailstones, will fall. A stormy wind will tear it.
verses.ct: Tell those who plaster it with whitewash that the wall is going to collapse. A torrential rain will pour down, massive hailstones will pound it, and a violent wind will rip it apart.

verses.kjv: Lo, when the wall is fallen, shall it not be said unto you, Where is the daubing wherewith ye have daubed it?
verses.web: Behold, when the wall has fallen, won’t it be said to you, “Where is the plaster with which you have plastered it?”
verses.ct: When the wall comes crashing down, people will ask you, 'What happened to that nice coat of whitewash you put on it?'"

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; I will even rend it with a stormy wind in my fury; and there shall be an overflowing shower in mine anger, and great hailstones in my fury to consume it.
verses.web: “ ‘Therefore the Lord LORD says: “I will even tear it with a stormy wind in my wrath. There will be an overflowing shower in my anger, and great hailstones in wrath to consume it.
verses.ct: "So this is what the Lord GOD says: In my fury I will unleash a violent wind. In my anger I will send a torrential downpour, and in my wrath, massive hailstones to destroy it completely.

verses.kjv: So will I break down the wall that ye have daubed with untempered morter, and bring it down to the ground, so that the foundation thereof shall be discovered, and it shall fall, and ye shall be consumed in the midst thereof: and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.web: So I will break down the wall that you have plastered with whitewash, and bring it down to the ground, so that its foundation will be uncovered. It will fall, and you will be consumed in the middle of it. Then you will know that I am LORD.
verses.ct: I will demolish the wall you plastered with whitewash and level it to the ground, exposing its foundation. When it falls, you will be crushed beneath it. Then you will know that I am the LORD.

verses.kjv: Thus will I accomplish my wrath upon the wall, and upon them that have daubed it with untempered morter, and will say unto you, The wall is no more, neither they that daubed it;
verses.web: Thus I will accomplish my wrath on the wall, and on those who have plastered it with whitewash. I will tell you, ‘The wall is no more, neither those who plastered it;
verses.ct: I will spend my full wrath on the wall and on those who plastered it with whitewash. Then I will tell you: The wall is gone, and so are those who covered it up —

verses.kjv: To wit, the prophets of Israel which prophesy concerning Jerusalem, and which see visions of peace for her, and there is no peace, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: to wit, the prophets of Israel who prophesy concerning Jerusalem, and who see visions of peace for her, and there is no peace,’ ” says the Lord LORD.’ ”
verses.ct: those prophets of Israel who prophesied about Jerusalem and saw visions of peace for her when there was no peace," declares the Lord GOD."

verses.kjv: Likewise, thou son of man, set thy face against the daughters of thy people, which prophesy out of their own heart; and prophesy thou against them,
verses.web: You, son of man, set your face against the daughters of your people, who prophesy out of their own heart; and prophesy against them,
verses.ct: "Now, son of man, turn your attention to the women among your people who prophesy from their own imagination. Prophesy against them

verses.kjv: And say, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Woe to the women that sew pillows to all armholes, and make kerchiefs upon the head of every stature to hunt souls! Will ye hunt the souls of my people, and will ye save the souls alive that come unto you?
verses.web: and say, “The Lord LORD says: ‘Woe to the women who sew pillows on all elbows, and make kerchiefs for the head of persons of every stature to hunt souls! Will you hunt the souls of my people, and save souls alive for yourselves?
verses.ct: and say, 'This is what the Lord GOD says: How terrible it will be for the women who sew magic bands on every wrist and make veils for heads of every size to trap people's souls! Do you think you can hunt down the souls of my people and keep your own souls safe?

verses.kjv: And will ye pollute me among my people for handfuls of barley and for pieces of bread, to slay the souls that should not die, and to save the souls alive that should not live, by your lying to my people that hear your lies?
verses.web: You have profaned me among my people for handfuls of barley and for pieces of bread, to kill the souls who should not die, and to save the souls alive who should not live, by your lying to my people who listen to lies.’
verses.ct: You have dishonored me among my people for handfuls of barley and scraps of bread. You kill souls that should not die and spare souls that should not live — all by lying to my people, who eagerly swallow your lies.'

verses.kjv: Wherefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I am against your pillows, wherewith ye there hunt the souls to make them fly, and I will tear them from your arms, and will let the souls go, even the souls that ye hunt to make them fly.
verses.web: “Therefore the Lord LORD says: ‘Behold, I am against your pillows, with which you hunt the souls to make them fly, and I will tear them from your arms. I will let the souls go, even the souls whom you hunt to make them fly.
verses.ct: "So this is what the Lord GOD says: I am against your magic bands that you use to trap souls like birds. I will rip them off your arms and set free the souls you are hunting like prey.

verses.kjv: Your kerchiefs also will I tear, and deliver my people out of your hand, and they shall be no more in your hand to be hunted; and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.web: I will also tear your kerchiefs, and deliver my people out of your hand, and they will be no more in your hand to be hunted. Then you will know that I am LORD.
verses.ct: I will also tear off your veils and rescue my people from your grip. They will no longer be your victims to hunt down. Then you will know that I am the LORD.

verses.kjv: Because with lies ye have made the heart of the righteous sad, whom I have not made sad; and strengthened the hands of the wicked, that he should not return from his wicked way, by promising him life:
verses.web: Because with lies you have grieved the heart of the righteous, whom I have not made sad; and strengthened the hands of the wicked, that he should not return from his wicked way, and be saved alive.
verses.ct: You have crushed the hearts of righteous people with your lies — people I never intended to grieve. And you have encouraged the wicked so they won't turn from their evil ways and be saved, by promising them life.

verses.kjv: Therefore ye shall see no more vanity, nor divine divinations: for I will deliver my people out of your hand: and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.web: Therefore you shall no more see false visions, nor practice divination. I will deliver my people out of your hand. Then you will know that I am LORD.’ ”
verses.ct: Because of this, you will no longer see false visions or practice divination. I will rescue my people from your power. Then you will know that I am the LORD."
